description: Luffy activates Gear Second and delivers a powerful kick while his leg is coated with water. This technique specifically exploits the weakness of Crocodile's Suna Suna no Mi (Sand-Sand Fruit), as water solidifies sand and makes Crocodile's body tangible.
firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique to intercept Crocodile's surprise attack on Whitebeard at Marineford. By coating his leg with water and using Gear Second's enhanced speed, Luffy successfully stops Crocodile and kicks him away.
